highlights: Built a greenfield WebRTC videoconferencing web application.

Managed third-party integrations with major social media platforms for livestreaming, post creation, and realtime comments.
Overhauled Stripe customer billing integration, including support for Google Pay and Apple Pay.
Provided professional and technical guidance to junior developers.

summary: A restaurant technology company creating kitchen display systems and table management solutions.

Maintained and implemented new features in internal and customer-facing web applications.
Implemented a redesign of a customer-facing enterprise web application.
Maintained and implemented performance improvements in a monolithic enterprise service.
Create, build and host personal websites for clients.
Independent development contract work for small and medium-sized businesses.
Integrate projects with third-party APIs, including payment systems, social media, and video streaming.
